vacation rentals
real estate sales









rental and real estate experts
full service agency

welcome to the crystal coast! we are your trusted experts in emerald isle, nc!at shorewood real estate, we offer a full range of services, from vacation rentals and long-term leasing to property management and helping you buy and sell real expertise with years of experience and knowledge.let us help you plan the ultimate north carolina beach getaway! our diverse selection of rentals fits every budget, including cozy condos, charming single-family homes, spacious duplexes, and luxurious 5+ bedroom properties ideal for large families or groups.ready to start your adventure? explore our latest deals today and dive into your dream beach vacation!

bedrooms


we booked with shorewood 3 days before we arrived in ei, after another rental company cancelled our 2 week reservation 5 days before our planned arrival. shorewood was great to work with. we have a very old dog who was coming with us and it was important to us to understand access to the house and the beach because he cannot manage stairs well. shorewood staff was very patient answering all our questions and the house worked great for us! we had a small issue with the tv in the bedroom and they were very responsive and fixed it right away. we wanted to stay an extra day and they were able to accommodate us. as soon as we locked the door and drove away, we remembered we had left a jacket inside and shorewood found it for us and sent it to us. i recommend them without reservation; they saved our vacation and were much better to work with than the rental company we originally planned our vacation with.

bedrooms




julie d.







bedrooms


very helpful, kind and easy to work with. we have rented twice from shorewood without any trouble....

bedrooms




jo-anne f.







bedrooms


enjoyed stay as property experience was as advertised. morgan, booking agent, was efficient, effective and courteous.

bedrooms




gene z.







bedrooms


shorewood has been very responsive to any questions we had about the property prior to arriving to the property. always answered our email! shorewood responded quickly on checkin day when the elevator was locked on a different floor and would not move. they were also very attentive when we stopped by after checkout to review a list of recommendations we had for the property we rented thank you shorewood!!!!

bedrooms




linda g.







bedrooms


just wanted to let you know that we had a wonderful time staying at the pebble beach condo complex. it was our first visit to emerald isle and we are looking forward to coming back next summer. thanks again to you and the shorewood staff for all your help. trisha young

bedrooms




trisha y.
